attributes.action: Stop the Triage system at Doctors Surgeries
attributes.additional_details: Having to fill out forms to get to see a doctor in the morning is not going to work.A lot of the older generation will struggle to do this.Please just leave it as it is and let us go back to calling on the phone for same day appointments and also pre bookable appointments.
attributes.background: Stop Triage systems at doctors surgeries and bring back pre bookable appointments.The triage system will put pressure on the NHS.Also re open walk in centres to help ease traffic on doctors surgeries and hospitals.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The UK Government has recently required GP surgeries to enable patients to book appointments online throughout the day, however it hasn't stopped GP surgeries from allowing people to book appointments by phone. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/online-gp-appointment-requests-available-everywhere-from-today

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to provide funding for more walk in centres, if that's something that you'd like to see.
